Special Powers
If Alicia Grimm is within 4 squares of an opposing character, The Thing modifies speed, attack and damage +1. // When she is KO'd by an opponent's attack, after resolutions heal The Thing to his starting click and modify his speed, attack, and damage +1 for the rest of the game.

February 19, 2021
Goop
Just a reminder that you can only use support if the character you are healing isn't based with an enemy, so it might be hard to use on Thing while he's in a fight. Also note she only gives Thing the perma bonus if she dies from an ATTACK so watch out for poison and things similar to it.
